sn37.34:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, vaddhihi vaddhamana ariyasavika ariyaya vaddhiya vaddhati saradayini ca hoti varadayini ca kayassa.
sn37.34:1.3: Saddhaya vaddhati, silena vaddhati, sutena vaddhati, cagena vaddhati, pannaya vaddhati—
sn37.34:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi vaddhihi vaddhamana ariyasavika ariyaya vaddhiya vaddhati, saradayini ca hoti, varadayini ca kayassati.
